```py
set.seed(123)

user_data <- tibble(
  user_id = 1:10,
  age = floor(runif(10, min = 13, max = 35)),
  region = sample(c("UK", "USA", "EU"), 10, replace = TRUE)
)
```

```py
user_data %>%
  mutate(drinking_age = case_when(region == "USA" & age >= 21 ~ TRUE,
                                  region == "EU" & age >= 18 ~ TRUE,
                                  .default = FALSE))
```
